title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions for Bentley Systems Inc

content.text: Bentley Systems Inc went public on September 23, 2020, with an initial offering price of $22 per share.

On May 27, 2021, Bentley Systems Inc announced a 1-for-2 reverse stock split. This means that for every two shares owned, shareholders received one new share. The stock price doubled as a result of this split.
On October 20, 2021, Bentley Systems Inc acquired Seequent Holdings Limited, a leader in geoscience software solutions, for approximately $900 million.

On December 1, 2021, Bentley Systems Inc executed a 3-for-1 forward stock split. Shareholders received two additional shares for each share they owned. The stock price reduced to one-third of its pre-split value.
